Title: .exe
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), Greg Plageman, Erik Mountain, Lucas O'Connor (executive story editor), Tony Camerino (story editor), Andy Callahan (story editor)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Kevin Chapman, Amy Acker, Sarah Shahi
Plot: As Reese and Shaw race to catch up with Finch, he infiltrates a maximum-security government facility in a desperate mission which could mean the end for not only Samaritan, but for himself and The Machine as well.
